00033 typedef map<void*, ShaderNode*> PtrNodeMap;
00034 typedef pair<ShaderNode*, std::string> SocketPair;
00035 typedef map<void*, SocketPair> PtrSockMap;

00037 /* Find */
00038 
00039 void BlenderSync::find_shader(BL::ID id, vector<uint>& used_shaders, int default_shader)
00040 {
00041     Shader *shader = (id)? shader_map.find(id): scene->shaders[default_shader];
00042 
00043     for(size_t i = 0; i < scene->shaders.size(); i++) {
00044         if(scene->shaders[i] == shader) {
00045             used_shaders.push_back(i);
00046             break;
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }

00051 /* Graph */
00052 
00053 static BL::NodeSocket get_node_output(BL::Node b_node, const string& name)
00054 {
00055     BL::Node::outputs_iterator b_out;
00056 
00057     for(b_node.outputs.begin(b_out); b_out != b_node.outputs.end(); ++b_out)
00058         if(b_out->name() == name)
00059             return *b_out;
00060 
00061     assert(0);
00062 
00063     return *b_out;
00064 }
00065 
00066 static float3 get_node_output_rgba(BL::Node b_node, const string& name)
00067 {
00068     BL::NodeSocketRGBA sock(get_node_output(b_node, name));
00069     return get_float3(sock.default_value());
00070 }
00071 
00072 static float get_node_output_value(BL::Node b_node, const string& name)
00073 {
00074     BL::NodeSocketFloatNone sock(get_node_output(b_node, name));
00075     return sock.default_value();
00076 }
00077 
00078 static void get_tex_mapping(TextureMapping *mapping, BL::TexMapping b_mapping)
00079 {
00080     if(!b_mapping)
00081         return;
00082 
00083     mapping->translation = get_float3(b_mapping.translation());
00084     mapping->rotation = get_float3(b_mapping.rotation());
00085     mapping->scale = get_float3(b_mapping.scale());
00086 
00087     mapping->x_mapping = (TextureMapping::Mapping)b_mapping.mapping_x();
00088     mapping->y_mapping = (TextureMapping::Mapping)b_mapping.mapping_y();
00089     mapping->z_mapping = (TextureMapping::Mapping)b_mapping.mapping_z();
00090 }
00091 
00092 static void get_tex_mapping(TextureMapping *mapping, BL::ShaderNodeMapping b_mapping)
00093 {
00094     if(!b_mapping)
00095         return;
00096 
00097     mapping->translation = get_float3(b_mapping.translation());
00098     mapping->rotation = get_float3(b_mapping.rotation());
00099     mapping->scale = get_float3(b_mapping.scale());
00100 }

00102 static ShaderNode *add_node(BL::BlendData b_data, ShaderGraph *graph, BL::ShaderNode b_node)
00103 {
00104     ShaderNode *node = NULL;
00105 
00106     switch(b_node.type()) {
00107         /* not supported */
00108         case BL::ShaderNode::type_CURVE_VEC: break;
00109         case BL::ShaderNode::type_GEOMETRY: break;
00110         case BL::ShaderNode::type_MATERIAL: break;
00111         case BL::ShaderNode::type_MATERIAL_EXT: break;
00112         case BL::ShaderNode::type_OUTPUT: break;
00113         case BL::ShaderNode::type_SCRIPT: break;
00114         case BL::ShaderNode::type_SQUEEZE: break;
00115         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEXTURE: break;
00116         /* handled outside this function */
00117         case BL::ShaderNode::type_GROUP: break;
00118         /* existing blender nodes */
00119         case BL::ShaderNode::type_CURVE_RGB: {
00120             RGBCurvesNode *ramp = new RGBCurvesNode();
00121             node = ramp;
00122             break;
00123         }
00124         case BL::ShaderNode::type_VALTORGB: {
00125             RGBRampNode *ramp = new RGBRampNode();
00126             BL::ShaderNodeValToRGB b_ramp_node(b_node);
00127             colorramp_to_array(b_ramp_node.color_ramp(), ramp->ramp, RAMP_TABLE_SIZE);
00128             node = ramp;
00129             break;
00130         }
00131         case BL::ShaderNode::type_RGB: {
00132             ColorNode *color = new ColorNode();
00133             color->value = get_node_output_rgba(b_node, "Color");
00134             node = color;
00135             break;
00136         }
00137         case BL::ShaderNode::type_VALUE: {
00138             ValueNode *value = new ValueNode();
00139             value->value = get_node_output_value(b_node, "Value");
00140             node = value;
00141             break;
00142         }
00143         case BL::ShaderNode::type_CAMERA: {
00144             node = new CameraNode();
00145             break;
00146         }
00147         case BL::ShaderNode::type_INVERT: {
00148             node = new InvertNode();
00149             break;
00150         }
00151         case BL::ShaderNode::type_GAMMA: {
00152             node = new GammaNode();
00153             break;
00154         }
00155         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BRIGHTCONTRAST: {
00156             node = new BrightContrastNode();
00157             break;
00158         }
00159         case BL::ShaderNode::type_MIX_RGB: {
00160             BL::ShaderNodeMixRGB b_mix_node(b_node);
00161             MixNode *mix = new MixNode();
00162             mix->type = MixNode::type_enum[b_mix_node.blend_type()];
00163             node = mix;
00164             break;
00165         }
00166         case BL::ShaderNode::type_SEPRGB: {
00167             node = new SeparateRGBNode();
00168             break;
00169         }
00170         case BL::ShaderNode::type_COMBRGB: {
00171             node = new CombineRGBNode();
00172             break;
00173         }
00174         case BL::ShaderNode::type_HUE_SAT: {
00175             node = new HSVNode();
00176             break;
00177         }
00178         case BL::ShaderNode::type_RGBTOBW: {
00179             node = new ConvertNode(SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR, SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00180             break;
00181         }
00182         case BL::ShaderNode::type_MATH: {
00183             BL::ShaderNodeMath b_math_node(b_node);
00184             MathNode *math = new MathNode();
00185             math->type = MathNode::type_enum[b_math_node.operation()];
00186             node = math;
00187             break;
00188         }
00189         case BL::ShaderNode::type_VECT_MATH: {
00190             BL::ShaderNodeVectorMath b_vector_math_node(b_node);
00191             VectorMathNode *vmath = new VectorMathNode();
00192             vmath->type = VectorMathNode::type_enum[b_vector_math_node.operation()];
00193             node = vmath;
00194             break;
00195         }
00196         case BL::ShaderNode::type_NORMAL: {
00197             BL::Node::outputs_iterator out_it;
00198             b_node.outputs.begin(out_it);
00199             BL::NodeSocketVectorNone vec_sock(*out_it);
00200 
00201             NormalNode *norm = new NormalNode();
00202             norm->direction = get_float3(vec_sock.default_value());
00203 
00204             node = norm;
00205             break;
00206         }
00207         case BL::ShaderNode::type_MAPPING: {
00208             BL::ShaderNodeMapping b_mapping_node(b_node);
00209             MappingNode *mapping = new MappingNode();
00210 
00211             get_tex_mapping(&mapping->tex_mapping, b_mapping_node);
00212 
00213             node = mapping;
00214             break;
00215         }
00216 
00217         /* new nodes */
00218         case BL::ShaderNode::type_OUTPUT_MATERIAL:
00219         case BL::ShaderNode::type_OUTPUT_WORLD:
00220         case BL::ShaderNode::type_OUTPUT_LAMP: {
00221             node = graph->output();
00222             break;
00223         }
00224         case BL::ShaderNode::type_FRESNEL: {
00225             node = new FresnelNode();
00226             break;
00227         }
00228         case BL::ShaderNode::type_LAYER_WEIGHT: {
00229             node = new LayerWeightNode();
00230             break;
00231         }
00232         case BL::ShaderNode::type_ADD_SHADER: {
00233             node = new AddClosureNode();
00234             break;
00235         }
00236         case BL::ShaderNode::type_MIX_SHADER: {
00237             node = new MixClosureNode();
00238             break;
00239         }
00240         case BL::ShaderNode::type_ATTRIBUTE: {
00241             BL::ShaderNodeAttribute b_attr_node(b_node);
00242             AttributeNode *attr = new AttributeNode();
00243             attr->attribute = b_attr_node.attribute_name();
00244             node = attr;
00245             break;
00246         }
00247         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BACKGROUND: {
00248             node = new BackgroundNode();
00249             break;
00250         }
00251         case BL::ShaderNode::type_HOLDOUT: {
00252             node = new HoldoutNode();
00253             break;
00254         }
00255         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BSDF_DIFFUSE: {
00256             node = new DiffuseBsdfNode();
00257             break;
00258         }
00259         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BSDF_GLOSSY: {
00260             BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlossy b_glossy_node(b_node);
00261             GlossyBsdfNode *glossy = new GlossyBsdfNode();
00262 
00263             switch(b_glossy_node.distribution()) {
00264                 case BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlossy::distribution_SHARP:
00265                     glossy->distribution = ustring("Sharp");
00266                     break;
00267                 case BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlossy::distribution_BECKMANN:
00268                     glossy->distribution = ustring("Beckmann");
00269                     break;
00270                 case BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlossy::distribution_GGX:
00271                     glossy->distribution = ustring("GGX");
00272                     break;
00273             }
00274             node = glossy;
00275             break;
00276         }
00277         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BSDF_GLASS: {
00278             BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlass b_glass_node(b_node);
00279             GlassBsdfNode *glass = new GlassBsdfNode();
00280             switch(b_glass_node.distribution()) {
00281                 case BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlass::distribution_SHARP:
00282                     glass->distribution = ustring("Sharp");
00283                     break;
00284                 case BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlass::distribution_BECKMANN:
00285                     glass->distribution = ustring("Beckmann");
00286                     break;
00287                 case BL::ShaderNodeBsdfGlass::distribution_GGX:
00288                     glass->distribution = ustring("GGX");
00289                     break;
00290             }
00291             node = glass;
00292             break;
00293         }
00294         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BSDF_TRANSLUCENT: {
00295             node = new TranslucentBsdfNode();
00296             break;
00297         }
00298         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BSDF_TRANSPARENT: {
00299             node = new TransparentBsdfNode();
00300             break;
00301         }
00302         case BL::ShaderNode::type_BSDF_VELVET: {
00303             node = new VelvetBsdfNode();
00304             break;
00305         }
00306         case BL::ShaderNode::type_EMISSION: {
00307             node = new EmissionNode();
00308             break;
00309         }
00310         case BL::ShaderNode::type_VOLUME_ISOTROPIC: {
00311             node = new IsotropicVolumeNode();
00312             break;
00313         }
00314         case BL::ShaderNode::type_VOLUME_TRANSPARENT: {
00315             node = new TransparentVolumeNode();
00316             break;
00317         }
00318         case BL::ShaderNode::type_NEW_GEOMETRY: {
00319             node = new GeometryNode();
00320             break;
00321         }
00322         case BL::ShaderNode::type_LIGHT_PATH: {
00323             node = new LightPathNode();
00324             break;
00325         }
00326         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_IMAGE: {
00327             BL::ShaderNodeTexImage b_image_node(b_node);
00328             BL::Image b_image(b_image_node.image());
00329             ImageTextureNode *image = new ImageTextureNode();
00330             /* todo: handle generated/builtin images */
00331             if(b_image)
00332                 image->filename = blender_absolute_path(b_data, b_image, b_image.filepath());
00333             image->color_space = ImageTextureNode::color_space_enum[(int)b_image_node.color_space()];
00334             get_tex_mapping(&image->tex_mapping, b_image_node.texture_mapping());
00335             node = image;
00336             break;
00337         }
00338         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_ENVIRONMENT: {
00339             BL::ShaderNodeTexEnvironment b_env_node(b_node);
00340             BL::Image b_image(b_env_node.image());
00341             EnvironmentTextureNode *env = new EnvironmentTextureNode();
00342             if(b_image)
00343                 env->filename = blender_absolute_path(b_data, b_image, b_image.filepath());
00344             env->color_space = EnvironmentTextureNode::color_space_enum[(int)b_env_node.color_space()];
00345             env->projection = EnvironmentTextureNode::projection_enum[(int)b_env_node.projection()];
00346             get_tex_mapping(&env->tex_mapping, b_env_node.texture_mapping());
00347             node = env;
00348             break;
00349         }
00350         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_GRADIENT: {
00351             BL::ShaderNodeTexGradient b_gradient_node(b_node);
00352             GradientTextureNode *gradient = new GradientTextureNode();
00353             gradient->type = GradientTextureNode::type_enum[(int)b_gradient_node.gradient_type()];
00354             get_tex_mapping(&gradient->tex_mapping, b_gradient_node.texture_mapping());
00355             node = gradient;
00356             break;
00357         }
00358         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_VORONOI: {
00359             BL::ShaderNodeTexVoronoi b_voronoi_node(b_node);
00360             VoronoiTextureNode *voronoi = new VoronoiTextureNode();
00361             voronoi->coloring = VoronoiTextureNode::coloring_enum[(int)b_voronoi_node.coloring()];
00362             get_tex_mapping(&voronoi->tex_mapping, b_voronoi_node.texture_mapping());
00363             node = voronoi;
00364             break;
00365         }
00366         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_MAGIC: {
00367             BL::ShaderNodeTexMagic b_magic_node(b_node);
00368             MagicTextureNode *magic = new MagicTextureNode();
00369             magic->depth = b_magic_node.turbulence_depth();
00370             get_tex_mapping(&magic->tex_mapping, b_magic_node.texture_mapping());
00371             node = magic;
00372             break;
00373         }
00374         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_WAVE: {
00375             BL::ShaderNodeTexWave b_wave_node(b_node);
00376             WaveTextureNode *wave = new WaveTextureNode();
00377             wave->type = WaveTextureNode::type_enum[(int)b_wave_node.wave_type()];
00378             get_tex_mapping(&wave->tex_mapping, b_wave_node.texture_mapping());
00379             node = wave;
00380             break;
00381         }
00382         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_CHECKER: {
00383             BL::ShaderNodeTexChecker b_checker_node(b_node);
00384             CheckerTextureNode *checker = new CheckerTextureNode();
00385             get_tex_mapping(&checker->tex_mapping, b_checker_node.texture_mapping());
00386             node = checker;
00387             break;
00388         }
00389         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_NOISE: {
00390             BL::ShaderNodeTexNoise b_noise_node(b_node);
00391             NoiseTextureNode *noise = new NoiseTextureNode();
00392             get_tex_mapping(&noise->tex_mapping, b_noise_node.texture_mapping());
00393             node = noise;
00394             break;
00395         }
00396         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_MUSGRAVE: {
00397             BL::ShaderNodeTexMusgrave b_musgrave_node(b_node);
00398             MusgraveTextureNode *musgrave = new MusgraveTextureNode();
00399             musgrave->type = MusgraveTextureNode::type_enum[(int)b_musgrave_node.musgrave_type()];
00400             get_tex_mapping(&musgrave->tex_mapping, b_musgrave_node.texture_mapping());
00401             node = musgrave;
00402             break;
00403         }
00404         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_COORD: {
00405             node = new TextureCoordinateNode();;
00406             break;
00407         }
00408         case BL::ShaderNode::type_TEX_SKY: {
00409             BL::ShaderNodeTexSky b_sky_node(b_node);
00410             SkyTextureNode *sky = new SkyTextureNode();
00411             sky->sun_direction = get_float3(b_sky_node.sun_direction());
00412             sky->turbidity = b_sky_node.turbidity();
00413             get_tex_mapping(&sky->tex_mapping, b_sky_node.texture_mapping());
00414             node = sky;
00415             break;
00416         }
00417     }
00418 
00419     if(node && node != graph->output())
00420         graph->add(node);
00421 
00422     return node;
00423 }
00424 
00425 static SocketPair node_socket_map_pair(PtrNodeMap& node_map, BL::Node b_node, BL::NodeSocket b_socket)
00426 {
00427     BL::Node::inputs_iterator b_input;
00428     BL::Node::outputs_iterator b_output;
00429     string name = b_socket.name();
00430     bool found = false;
00431     int counter = 0, total = 0;
00432 
00433     /* find in inputs */
00434     for(b_node.inputs.begin(b_input); b_input != b_node.inputs.end(); ++b_input) {
00435         if(b_input->name() == name) {
00436             if(!found)
00437                 counter++;
00438             total++;
00439         }
00440 
00441         if(b_input->ptr.data == b_socket.ptr.data)
00442             found = true;
00443     }
00444 
00445     if(!found) {
00446         /* find in outputs */
00447         found = false;
00448         counter = 0;
00449         total = 0;
00450 
00451         for(b_node.outputs.begin(b_output); b_output != b_node.outputs.end(); ++b_output) {
00452             if(b_output->name() == name) {
00453                 if(!found)
00454                     counter++;
00455                 total++;
00456             }
00457 
00458             if(b_output->ptr.data == b_socket.ptr.data)
00459                 found = true;
00460         }
00461     }
00462 
00463     /* rename if needed */
00464     if(name == "Shader")
00465         name = "Closure";
00466 
00467     if(total > 1)
00468         name = string_printf("%s%d", name.c_str(), counter);
00469 
00470     return SocketPair(node_map[b_node.ptr.data], name);
00471 }
00472 
00473 static ShaderSocketType convert_socket_type(BL::NodeSocket::type_enum b_type)
00474 {
00475     switch (b_type) {
00476     case BL::NodeSocket::type_VALUE:
00477         return SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT;
00478     case BL::NodeSocket::type_VECTOR:
00479         return SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR;
00480     case BL::NodeSocket::type_RGBA:
00481         return SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR;
00482     case BL::NodeSocket::type_SHADER:
00483         return SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE;
00484     
00485     case BL::NodeSocket::type_BOOLEAN:
00486     case BL::NodeSocket::type_MESH:
00487     case BL::NodeSocket::type_INT:
00488     default:
00489         return SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT;
00490     }
00491 }
00492 
00493 static void set_default_value(ShaderInput *input, BL::NodeSocket sock)
00494 {
00495     /* copy values for non linked inputs */
00496     switch(input->type) {
00497     case SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT: {
00498         BL::NodeSocketFloatNone value_sock(sock);
00499         input->set(value_sock.default_value());
00500         break;
00501     }
00502     case SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR: {
00503         BL::NodeSocketRGBA rgba_sock(sock);
00504         input->set(get_float3(rgba_sock.default_value()));
00505         break;
00506     }
00507     case SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL:
00508     case SHADER_SOCKET_POINT:
00509     case SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR: {
00510         BL::NodeSocketVectorNone vec_sock(sock);
00511         input->set(get_float3(vec_sock.default_value()));
00512         break;
00513     }
00514     case SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE:
00515         break;
00516     }
00517 }
00518 
00519 static void add_nodes(BL::BlendData b_data, ShaderGraph *graph, BL::ShaderNodeTree b_ntree, PtrSockMap& sockets_map)
00520 {
00521     /* add nodes */
00522     BL::ShaderNodeTree::nodes_iterator b_node;
00523     PtrNodeMap node_map;
00524     PtrSockMap proxy_map;
00525 
00526     for(b_ntree.nodes.begin(b_node); b_node != b_ntree.nodes.end(); ++b_node) {
00527         if(b_node->is_a(&RNA_NodeGroup)) {
00528             /* add proxy converter nodes for inputs and outputs */
00529             BL::NodeGroup b_gnode(*b_node);
00530             BL::ShaderNodeTree b_group_ntree(b_gnode.node_tree());
00531             if (!b_group_ntree)
00532                 continue;
00533 
00534             BL::Node::inputs_iterator b_input;
00535             BL::Node::outputs_iterator b_output;
00536             
00537             PtrSockMap group_sockmap;
00538             
00539             for(b_node->inputs.begin(b_input); b_input != b_node->inputs.end(); ++b_input) {
00540                 ShaderSocketType extern_type = convert_socket_type(b_input->type());
00541                 ShaderSocketType intern_type = convert_socket_type(b_input->group_socket().type());
00542                 ShaderNode *proxy = graph->add(new ProxyNode(extern_type, intern_type));
00543                 
00544                 /* map the external node socket to the proxy node socket */
00545                 proxy_map[b_input->ptr.data] = SocketPair(proxy, proxy->inputs[0]->name);
00546                 /* map the internal group socket to the proxy node socket */
00547                 group_sockmap[b_input->group_socket().ptr.data] = SocketPair(proxy, proxy->outputs[0]->name);
00548                 
00549                 /* default input values of the group node */
00550                 set_default_value(proxy->inputs[0], *b_input);
00551             }
00552             
00553             for(b_node->outputs.begin(b_output); b_output != b_node->outputs.end(); ++b_output) {
00554                 ShaderSocketType extern_type = convert_socket_type(b_output->type());
00555                 ShaderSocketType intern_type = convert_socket_type(b_output->group_socket().type());
00556                 ShaderNode *proxy = graph->add(new ProxyNode(intern_type, extern_type));
00557                 
00558                 /* map the external node socket to the proxy node socket */
00559                 proxy_map[b_output->ptr.data] = SocketPair(proxy, proxy->outputs[0]->name);
00560                 /* map the internal group socket to the proxy node socket */
00561                 group_sockmap[b_output->group_socket().ptr.data] = SocketPair(proxy, proxy->inputs[0]->name);
00562                 
00563                 /* default input values of internal, unlinked group outputs */
00564                 set_default_value(proxy->inputs[0], b_output->group_socket());
00565             }
00566             
00567             add_nodes(b_data, graph, b_group_ntree, group_sockmap);
00568         }
00569         else {
00570             ShaderNode *node = add_node(b_data, graph, BL::ShaderNode(*b_node));
00571             
00572             if(node) {
00573                 BL::Node::inputs_iterator b_input;
00574                 
00575                 node_map[b_node->ptr.data] = node;
00576                 
00577                 for(b_node->inputs.begin(b_input); b_input != b_node->inputs.end(); ++b_input) {
00578                     SocketPair pair = node_socket_map_pair(node_map, *b_node, *b_input);
00579                     ShaderInput *input = pair.first->input(pair.second.c_str());
00580                     
00581                     assert(input);
00582                     
00583                     /* copy values for non linked inputs */
00584                     set_default_value(input, *b_input);
00585                 }
00586             }
00587         }
00588     }
00589 
00590     /* connect nodes */
00591     BL::NodeTree::links_iterator b_link;
00592 
00593     for(b_ntree.links.begin(b_link); b_link != b_ntree.links.end(); ++b_link) {
00594         /* get blender link data */
00595         BL::Node b_from_node = b_link->from_node();
00596         BL::Node b_to_node = b_link->to_node();
00597 
00598         BL::NodeSocket b_from_sock = b_link->from_socket();
00599         BL::NodeSocket b_to_sock = b_link->to_socket();
00600 
00601         SocketPair from_pair, to_pair;
00602 
00603         /* links without a node pointer are connections to group inputs/outputs */
00604 
00605         /* from sock */
00606         if(b_from_node) {
00607             if (b_from_node.is_a(&RNA_NodeGroup))
00608                 from_pair = proxy_map[b_from_sock.ptr.data];
00609             else
00610                 from_pair = node_socket_map_pair(node_map, b_from_node, b_from_sock);
00611         }
00612         else
00613             from_pair = sockets_map[b_from_sock.ptr.data];
00614 
00615         /* to sock */
00616         if(b_to_node) {
00617             if (b_to_node.is_a(&RNA_NodeGroup))
00618                 to_pair = proxy_map[b_to_sock.ptr.data];
00619             else
00620                 to_pair = node_socket_map_pair(node_map, b_to_node, b_to_sock);
00621         }
00622         else
00623             to_pair = sockets_map[b_to_sock.ptr.data];
00624 
00625         /* either node may be NULL when the node was not exported, typically
00626            because the node type is not supported */
00627         if(from_pair.first && to_pair.first) {
00628             ShaderOutput *output = from_pair.first->output(from_pair.second.c_str());
00629             ShaderInput *input = to_pair.first->input(to_pair.second.c_str());
00630 
00631             graph->connect(output, input);
00632         }
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00636 /* Sync Materials */
00637 
00638 void BlenderSync::sync_materials()
00639 {
00640     shader_map.set_default(scene->shaders[scene->default_surface]);
00641 
00642     /* material loop */
00643     BL::BlendData::materials_iterator b_mat;
00644 
00645     for(b_data.materials.begin(b_mat); b_mat != b_data.materials.end(); ++b_mat) {
00646         Shader *shader;
00647         
00648         /* test if we need to sync */
00649         if(shader_map.sync(&shader, *b_mat)) {
00650             ShaderGraph *graph = new ShaderGraph();
00651 
00652             shader->name = b_mat->name().c_str();
00653             shader->pass_id = b_mat->pass_index();
00654 
00655             /* create nodes */
00656             if(b_mat->use_nodes() && b_mat->node_tree()) {
00657                 PtrSockMap sock_to_node;
00658                 BL::ShaderNodeTree b_ntree(b_mat->node_tree());
00659 
00660                 add_nodes(b_data, graph, b_ntree, sock_to_node);
00661             }
00662             else {
00663                 ShaderNode *closure, *out;
00664 
00665                 closure = graph->add(new DiffuseBsdfNode());
00666                 closure->input("Color")->value = get_float3(b_mat->diffuse_color());
00667                 out = graph->output();
00668 
00669                 graph->connect(closure->output("BSDF"), out->input("Surface"));
00670             }
00671 
00672             /* settings */
00673             PointerRNA cmat = RNA_pointer_get(&b_mat->ptr, "cycles");
00674             shader->sample_as_light = get_boolean(cmat, "sample_as_light");
00675             shader->homogeneous_volume = get_boolean(cmat, "homogeneous_volume");
00676 
00677             shader->set_graph(graph);
00678             shader->tag_update(scene);
00679         }
00680     }
00681 }
00682 
00683 /* Sync World */
00684 
00685 void BlenderSync::sync_world()
00686 {
00687     Background *background = scene->background;
00688     Background prevbackground = *background;
00689 
00690     BL::World b_world = b_scene.world();
00691 
00692     if(world_recalc || b_world.ptr.data != world_map) {
00693         Shader *shader = scene->shaders[scene->default_background];
00694         ShaderGraph *graph = new ShaderGraph();
00695 
00696         /* create nodes */
00697         if(b_world && b_world.use_nodes() && b_world.node_tree()) {
00698             PtrSockMap sock_to_node;
00699             BL::ShaderNodeTree b_ntree(b_world.node_tree());
00700 
00701             add_nodes(b_data, graph, b_ntree, sock_to_node);
00702         }
00703         else if(b_world) {
00704             ShaderNode *closure, *out;
00705 
00706             closure = graph->add(new BackgroundNode());
00707             closure->input("Color")->value = get_float3(b_world.horizon_color());
00708             out = graph->output();
00709 
00710             graph->connect(closure->output("Background"), out->input("Surface"));
00711         }
00712 
00713         /* AO */
00714         if(b_world) {
00715             BL::WorldLighting b_light = b_world.light_settings();
00716 
00717             if(b_light.use_ambient_occlusion())
00718                 background->ao_factor = b_light.ao_factor();
00719             else
00720                 background->ao_factor = 0.0f;
00721 
00722             background->ao_distance = b_light.distance();
00723         }
00724 
00725         shader->set_graph(graph);
00726         shader->tag_update(scene);
00727     }
00728 
00729     PointerRNA cscene = RNA_pointer_get(&b_scene.ptr, "cycles");
00730     background->transparent = get_boolean(cscene, "film_transparent");
00731     background->use = render_layer.use_background;
00732 
00733     if(background->modified(prevbackground))
00734         background->tag_update(scene);
00735 }
00736 
00737 /* Sync Lamps */
00738 
00739 void BlenderSync::sync_lamps()
00740 {
00741     shader_map.set_default(scene->shaders[scene->default_light]);
00742 
00743     /* lamp loop */
00744     BL::BlendData::lamps_iterator b_lamp;
00745 
00746     for(b_data.lamps.begin(b_lamp); b_lamp != b_data.lamps.end(); ++b_lamp) {
00747         Shader *shader;
00748         
00749         /* test if we need to sync */
00750         if(shader_map.sync(&shader, *b_lamp)) {
00751             ShaderGraph *graph = new ShaderGraph();
00752 
00753             /* create nodes */
00754             if(b_lamp->use_nodes() && b_lamp->node_tree()) {
00755                 shader->name = b_lamp->name().c_str();
00756 
00757                 PtrSockMap sock_to_node;
00758                 BL::ShaderNodeTree b_ntree(b_lamp->node_tree());
00759 
00760                 add_nodes(b_data, graph, b_ntree, sock_to_node);
00761             }
00762             else {
00763                 ShaderNode *closure, *out;
00764                 float strength = 1.0f;
00765 
00766                 if(b_lamp->type() == BL::Lamp::type_POINT ||
00767                    b_lamp->type() == BL::Lamp::type_SPOT ||
00768                    b_lamp->type() == BL::Lamp::type_AREA)
00769                     strength = 100.0f;
00770 
00771                 closure = graph->add(new EmissionNode());
00772                 closure->input("Color")->value = get_float3(b_lamp->color());
00773                 closure->input("Strength")->value.x = strength;
00774                 out = graph->output();
00775 
00776                 graph->connect(closure->output("Emission"), out->input("Surface"));
00777             }
00778 
00779             shader->set_graph(graph);
00780             shader->tag_update(scene);
00781         }
00782     }
00783 }
00784 
00785 void BlenderSync::sync_shaders()
00786 {
00787     shader_map.pre_sync();
00788 
00789     sync_world();
00790     sync_lamps();
00791     sync_materials();
00792 
00793     /* false = don't delete unused shaders, not supported */
00794     shader_map.post_sync(false);
00795 }
